title: Fly Me to the Swamp
sub_head: Washington is the hot destination for ‘protest tourism.’
body:
President Joe Biden’s latest Covid rules are bound to discourage international travel, so the timing could be perfect for a popular domestic destination to attract even more visitors. Washington, D.C. isn’t just for school field trips and trade association meetings any more. Now it’s the undisputed mecca of unhappy vacationers!
Emily Davies and Ellie Silverman report in the Washington Post that “D.C. officials have embraced protest tourism”. For D.C. restaurants, it seems that progressively educated consumers are among their best customers. According to the Posties:
